title: Land owner / Developer can exercise an option to construct EWS / LIG tenements on the said 20% plot area as per provisions specified in subsequent Regulation No
clause_text: Land owner / Developer can exercise an option to construct EWS / LIG tenements on the said 20% plot area as per provisions specified in subsequent Regulation No.(b). Provided that the affordable Housing Plots / tenements as mentioned in (i, ii and iii)
